text: in the movie Wicker Park Alex says love
makes you do crazy things things in a
million years you never thought you'd
see yourself do but here you are doing
it sometimes our actions make it obvious
that we're in love on the other hand our
Behavior might be so subtle that we're
not even conscious of it in this video
you'll learn about six unconscious
things you do when you're in love keep
watching to find out if you do any of
these things yourself noticing their
needs have you noticed that you do
little acts of service like this for
your partner without thinking about it
you could be doing these things because
you're in love falling for someone
causes you to shift from focusing on
your own needs to considering your
partner's needs too this can show in
thoughtful actions that feel automatic
to you for example every morning Sai
wakes up and makes himself breakfast but
lately he automatically makes double the
amount so that his girlfriend can have
some too he subconsciously considers his
girlfriend's need needs rather than just
his own making
sacrifices when people are in love
they're mirror neurons which help us
empathize with others are significantly
more active this might explain why we
make compromises and sacrifices more for
people we love when you're in love you
might notice that you make sacrifices
for your loved one without thinking
twice these could be small like going to
a restaurant you're not too fond of for
date night because you know they really
want to go or it could be something
life-changing like moving across the
country to be with them you feel like
you would do whatever it takes to ensure
they're happy and you're subconsciously
more empathetic towards them than you
are with most
people we not
me here's a quick thought experiment to
see if you're in love with someone when
you talk about the future with them do
you find yourself saying we more than me
when you're in love you might
unconsciously use language that presents
you and your partner as a team and and
use words like I or me less often if you
picture a future with your love interest
in it this will start to show in the way
you
talk
idealization people who are in love
subconsciously Focus most of their
attention on their Partners positive
qualities in fact participants
perceptions of their Partners were even
more positive than their perceptions of
themselves when you're in love you might
idealize your partner meaning you only
see the good in them and put them on a
pedestal without even realizing it
subtle
touches Pop Quiz what's the most
reliable way you can tell by someone's
body language that they're in love the
answer is touch think PDA like
handholding or sitting close enough
together that your legs are touching
when you're in love you might
subconsciously touch the person to show
that you care about them an open heart
besides touch another unconscious thing
you do when you're in love is use more
open body language you might
automatically have a more relaxed
posture and face your chest or heart
space towards the person you love you
may also notice that your palms face
upward when you talk to them this is
another unconscious indication that you
are open and comfortable with them we
hope this video helped you learn about
the unconscious things you do when
